00072 #define flagsSingleParameter                    \
00073     required,           singleItem,     notEnumerated,  reserved,   \
00074     reserved,           reserved,       reserved,       reserved,   \
00075     reserved,           reserved,       reserved,       reserved,   \
00076     prepositionParam,   notFeminine,    notMasculine,   singular
00077

00080     required,           listOfItems,    notEnumerated,  reserved,   \
00081     reserved,           reserved,       reserved,       reserved,   \
00082     reserved,           reserved,       reserved,       reserved,   \
00083     prepositionParam,   notFeminine,    notMasculine,   singular
00084

00090     prepositionParam,   notFeminine,    notMasculine,   singular

00098     prepositionParam,   notFeminine,    notMasculine,   singular

00240 /* Normalize the AppleScript terminology */
00241 
00242 #if MSWindows   // These items come from AppleScript
00243 
00244 #ifndef AE_DESC_ENUMS
00245 #define AE_DESC_ENUMS
00246 
00247 
00248 #define  typeBoolean                   'bool'
00249 #define  typeChar                      'TEXT'
00250 
00251 /* Preferred numeric Apple event descriptor types */
00252 #define  typeSInt16                    'shor'
00253 #define  typeSInt32                    'long'
00254 #define  typeUInt32                    'magn'
00255 #define  typeSInt64                    'comp'
00256 #define  typeIEEE32BitFloatingPoint    'sing'
00257 #define  typeIEEE64BitFloatingPoint    'doub'
00258 #define  type128BitFloatingPoint       'ldbl'
00259 #define  typeDecimalStruct             'decm'
00260 
00261 /* Non-preferred Apple event descriptor types */
00262 #define  typeSMInt                     typeSInt16
00263 #define  typeShortInteger              typeSInt16
00264 #define  typeInteger                   typeSInt32
00265 #define  typeLongInteger               typeSInt32
00266 #define  typeMagnitude                 typeUInt32
00267 #define  typeComp                      typeSInt64
00268 #define  typeSMFloat                   typeIEEE32BitFloatingPoint
00269 #define  typeShortFloat                typeIEEE32BitFloatingPoint
00270 #define  typeFloat                     typeIEEE64BitFloatingPoint
00271 #define  typeLongFloat                 typeIEEE64BitFloatingPoint
00272 #define  typeExtended                  'exte'
00273 
00274 /* More Apple event descriptor types */
00275 #define  typeAEList                    'list'
00276 #define  typeAERecord                  'reco'
00277 #define  typeAppleEvent                'aevt'
00278 #define  typeEventRecord               'evrc'
00279 #define  typeTrue                      'true'
00280 #define  typeFalse                     'fals'
00281 #define  typeAlias                     'alis'
00282 #define  typeEnumerated                'enum'
00283 #define  typeType                      'type'
00284 #define  typeAppParameters             'appa'
00285 #define  typeProperty                  'prop'
00286 #define  typeFSS                       'fss '
00287 #define  typeFSRef                     'fsrf'
00288 #define  typeKeyword                   'keyw'
00289 #define  typeSectionH                  'sect'
00290 #define  typeWildCard                  '****'
00291 #define  typeApplSignature             'sign'
00292 #define  typeQDRectangle               'qdrt'
00293 #define  typeFixed                     'fixd'
00294 #define  typeProcessSerialNumber       'psn '
00295 #define  typeApplicationURL            'aprl'
00296 #define  typeNull                      'null'
00297 
00298 #endif // AE_DESC_ENUMS

00373 #define PIHasTerminologyProperty    0x6873746DL /* 'hstm' <PITerminology> Has <aete, 0> resource:
00374                                                         version number
00375                                                         classID:        Object or event class
00376                                                         eventID:        For events (typeNull otherwise)
00377                                                         terminologyID:  'aete' resource ID (ignored if PITerminologyProperty)
00378                                                         scopeString:    Unique string present if
00379                                                                         AppleScript not supported
00380                                                 */
00381 
00386 #define PITerminologyProperty       0x74726D6EL /* 'trmn' <aete> Used internally as terminology cache.
00387                                                     If present it is used instead of an aete resource.
00388                                                 */

00971 //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00972 //  WriteDescriptorProcs structure.
00973 //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00974 
00975 // Version:
00976 #define kCurrentWriteDescriptorProcsVersion 0
00977 
00978 #if PRAGMA_STRUCT_ALIGN
00979 #pragma options align=mac68k
00980 #endif
00981 
00987 typedef struct WriteDescriptorProcs
00988     {
00989     int16 writeDescriptorProcsVersion;    
00990     int16 numWriteDescriptorProcs;        
00992     OpenWriteDescriptorProc     openWriteDescriptorProc;  
00993     CloseWriteDescriptorProc    closeWriteDescriptorProc; 
00995     PutIntegerProc              putIntegerProc;    
00996     PutFloatProc                putFloatProc;      
00997     PutUnitFloatProc            putUnitFloatProc;  
00998     PutBooleanProc              putBooleanProc;    
00999     PutTextProc                 putTextProc;       
01000     PutAliasProc                putAliasProc;      
01002     PutEnumeratedProc           putEnumeratedProc;  
01003     PutClassProc                putClassProc;       
01004     PutSimpleReferenceProc      putSimpleReferenceProc;  
01005     PutObjectProc               putObjectProc;      
01007     PutCountProc                putCountProc;       
01009     PutStringProc               putStringProc;      
01012     PutScopedClassProc          putScopedClassProc;  
01014     PutScopedObjectProc         putScopedObjectProc; 
01016     } WriteDescriptorProcs;
01017 
01018 #if PRAGMA_STRUCT_ALIGN
01019 #pragma options align=reset
01020 #endif
01021 
01022 // Count:
01023 #define kCurrentWriteDescriptorProcsCount \
01024     ((sizeof(WriteDescriptorProcs) - offsetof(WriteDescriptorProcs, openWriteDescriptorProc)) / sizeof(void*))
01025 
01026 //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01027 //  ReadDescriptorProcs structure.
01028 //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01029 
01030 // Version:
01031 #define kCurrentReadDescriptorProcsVersion 0
01032 
01033 #if PRAGMA_STRUCT_ALIGN
01034 #pragma options align=mac68k
01035 #endif
01036 
01042 typedef struct ReadDescriptorProcs
01043     {
01044     int16 readDescriptorProcsVersion;    
01045     int16 numReadDescriptorProcs;        
01047     OpenReadDescriptorProc      openReadDescriptorProc;    
01048     CloseReadDescriptorProc     closeReadDescriptorProc;   
01049     GetKeyProc                  getKeyProc;         
01051     GetIntegerProc              getIntegerProc;     
01052     GetFloatProc                getFloatProc;       
01053     GetUnitFloatProc            getUnitFloatProc;   
01054     GetBooleanProc              getBooleanProc;     
01055     GetTextProc                 getTextProc;        
01056     GetAliasProc                getAliasProc;       
01058     GetEnumeratedProc           getEnumeratedProc;  
01059     GetClassProc                getClassProc;       
01060     GetSimpleReferenceProc      getSimpleReferenceProc;  
01061     GetObjectProc               getObjectProc;      
01063     GetCountProc                getCountProc;       
01065     GetStringProc               getStringProc;      
01066     GetPinnedIntegerProc        getPinnedIntegerProc;   
01067     GetPinnedFloatProc          getPinnedFloatProc;     
01068     GetPinnedUnitFloatProc      getPinnedUnitFloatProc; 
01070     } ReadDescriptorProcs;
01071 
01072 #if PRAGMA_STRUCT_ALIGN
01073 #pragma options align=reset
01074 #endif
01075 
01076 // Count:
01077 #define kCurrentReadDescriptorProcsCount \
01078     ((sizeof(ReadDescriptorProcs) - offsetof(ReadDescriptorProcs, openReadDescriptorProc)) / sizeof(void*))
